descriptions: Student demonstrates no understanding of the chi-square distribution.

Student demonstrates a satisfactory understanding of the chi-square distribution and can explain its basic properties.
Student demonstrates a strong understanding of the chi-square distribution and can accurately explain its properties and applications.
